scripts.style:watch: yarn run style:build && node-sass src/styles -o public/ --include-path ./node_modules/bootstrap-sass/assets/stylesheets/ --include-path ./node_modules/bourbon/app/assets/stylesheets/ --source-map-embed -w
scripts.script:build:dev: NODE_ENV=development browserify src/scripts/main.js -o public/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ transform-inline-environment-variables ] ]
scripts.script:build:prod: NODE_ENV=production  browserify src/scripts/main.js -o public/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ transform-inline-environment-variables ] ]
scripts.start: yarn run reset && concurrently "yarn run template:watch" "yarn run style:watch" "yarn run script:watch" "yarn run serv"
scripts.build:dev: yarn run reset && yarn run template:build && yarn run style:build && yarn run script:build:dev  && yarn run clear
scripts.build:prod: yarn run reset && yarn run template:build && yarn run style:build && yarn run script:build:prod && yarn run clear && yarn run minify
